text: At the young startup ottonova we're creating a new digital private health insurance for Germany. We're looking for a full time on-Site Senior Android Developer for our Munich office. English is our primary language, we'll support with relocation/Visa, we're very tech centric and also count ourselves to the FinTech and InsureTech hype. Job Ad: https://www.ottonova.de/en/jobs/senior-android-developer
